polis madhya prakashaka sahakara polis adhikari ruwan gunasekara hiru prawruththi anshayata kiya sitiye pradeshaye samaya aaraksha kirima sandaha kriyakala yuthu aakaraya pilibandawa polispathiwaraya wisin mehidi jyeshta polis niladharin danuwath kirimata da niyamitha bawayi.pasugiyada kayits - punkuduthiw dupathedi 17 hawiridi pasal sisuwiyak apayojanayata lakkara ghathanaya kirime siddhiya sambandhayen aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa sidukala parikshanawaladi wadagath thorathuru rasak anawarana wi athi bawayi polis madhya prakashakawaraya sandahan kale.me wanawitath mema ghathanaya sambandhayen sakakaruwan 9 deneku athadanguwata gena athi athara owun adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen pasuwa, labana masa palamuwanida dakwa rakshitha bandhanagara gatha keruna.
